description: The history of all the instances when a treatment plan was put on hold.

columns.name: TREATMENT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the plan record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HX_HOLD_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the UTC instant when it was put on hold.

columns.name: HX_HOLD_USER_ID
columns.description: A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the user who put the plan on hold.

columns.name: HX_HOLD_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the reason for putting the plan on hold.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Admission


Transfer


Discharge


Admitted with OP day


Not admitted with IP day


Plan Created


Protocol Added


Patient Contact Moved


New study version available


Plan Conversion


New study version available

columns.name: HX_HOLD_COMMENT
columns.description: A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the comment for putting the plan on hold.

columns.name: HX_RELEASE_INST_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the UTC instant when the hold on the plan was released.

columns.name: HX_RELEASE_USER_ID
columns.description: A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the user who released the plan from hold.

columns.name: HX_RELEASE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the reason for releasing the hold from the plan.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Admission


Transfer


Discharge


Study version updated

columns.name: HX_RELEASE_COMMENT
columns.description: A history of when this plan was put on hold. This is the comment given for releasing the hold from the plan.

columns.name: HX_HOLD_ADT_ID
columns.description: If this plan was put on hold because of an ADT event, this will be the ID of that ADT event.

columns.name: HX_HOLD_IS_UNDO_YN
columns.description:
Whether this hold action was the result of undoing an ADT event.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: HX_RELEASE_ADT_ID
columns.description: If this plan was released from hold because of an ADT event, this will be the ID of that ADT event.

columns.name: HX_RELEASE_IS_UNDO_YN
columns.description:
Whether this release from hold action was the result of undoing an ADT event.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: HX_HOLD_IS_UNDO_YN
